Articles.Content:
Are you supposed to be able to do science in contract mode as I get no option to do so or any eva reports any help would be appreciated

32bit on windows 8.1

You are supposed to be able to conduct experiments/reports normally in contract mode, all features from the previous career mode should still be there, as far as I know they've only added features. It may be a bug, could you be a bit more specific about the problem?
